      • hasNeighbor

        public boolean hasNeighbor()
        Returns whether the segment has a neighbor segment. Requires call of finalize().
        Returns:
        true, if left and/or right neighbor available.

      • hasGiveWayConnection

        public boolean hasGiveWayConnection()
        Returns whether the segment has a give-way connection. Requires call of finalize().
        Returns:
        true, if give-way connection available.
